wblut.hemesh.core
Class HE_Mesh

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.core.HE_MeshStructure
      wblut.hemesh.core.HE_Mesh
Direct Known Subclasses:
HE_DynamicMesh
public class HE_Mesh
extends HE_MeshStructure

Half-edge mesh data structure.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
